name: BodyWorksNeckShoulder
0:
”Alexa, open neck shoulder stretch”
”Alexa, start neck shoulder stretch”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: neck shoulder stretch
des:
Do you sit at a desk all day, or get stuck in long commutes? It's easy for your neck and shoulder muscles to tense and tighten, especially with repetitive motions like looking down at your phone all the time.

Body Works: Neck Shoulder is a step-by-step guide for a 5-minute stretch you can perform at the office, when you get out of bed… or even at the bus stop (if you don't mind some stares)!

Tell Alexa:
 - "Alexa, Pause" anytime to take a breather. Say "Alexa, Resume" when you are ready to keep going.
 - Say "Alexa, Next" to go to the next set, or "Alexa, Go Back" to restart the previous set.
 - Go past 5-minute marks with "Alexa, Loop On", and "Alexa, Loop Off" to finish out the routine.
 - Stuck in a rut? Say "Alexa, Shuffle" to change up the routine! "Alexa, Shuffle Off" to go back to our curated sequence.

Full version currently features three different routines so you won't have to repeat the same set every day.

Contact us for any suggestions and feedback at bodyworkswonder@gmail.com

Disclaimer : The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
